Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Three Mothers

    1. The sky was grey and sweaty
    2. and three fat mothers talked and smoked.
    3. A little kid lay on the ground
    4. and played with the newest Nintendo toy
    5. and next to him a little child
    6. held an Apple iPad in his stroller.
    7. The wind brought the traffic stink to me
    8. and I felt relief a little colder.
Previous: Grounding
@Molossus Spondee
